entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI TOP 1999/1. Operation and prospects of medium and big companies in Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D99: TÁRKI TOP 1999/1. Operation and prospects of medium and big companies in Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12
entry.dcterms:creator: Tóth, István János
entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Ministry of Economics and Transportation
entry.dcterms:description: ownership, employment, rentability, production, operation, export turnover, import-needs, delivery and invoicing discipline, taxing, debts
entry.dcterms:subject: economic conditions and indicators
labour and employment
economic policy
income, property and savings
social welfare policy and systems
business/industrial management and organisation
consumption/consumer behavior
trade, industry and markets
working conditions
economic organization
survey data
time-series
A random sample of companies containing the 1500 biggest production companies also exporting their products; sample based on the registry of the Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH).
Data collection with questionnaire, administered by interviewers, and self-administered questionnaires.
A
